synopsis.text: Light music club member Haruki Kitahara is on a mission to perform an original song at the school festival before he graduates. With only a month left, his dream seems to be slipping away as the club is on the brink of collapse. But one fateful day, as he plays his guitar, a beautiful voice and a mysterious piano melody join in, rekindling his hope. As he recruits two new members, including the school's idol, the complexities of love and friendship intertwine with their shared passion for music. Will they be able to put aside their personal feelings and work together to make their performance a reality? Join Haruki and his friends in this heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and the power of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
